nodes.bodyText:
nit, have you considered extracting this to a function?
Often streams are best when there is no or little body (eg; try to convert most of the blocks into method references).
Beyond that, looks fine, feel free to update and merge. (I'll be AFK for a day or two).

Ah, sorry for not replying, I wanted to extract it to a method (would also get rid of the explicit type parameters), but I simply just haven't got to it yet.
Will follow up soon-ish
